Tenzin the Thrill-Seeker-at-Sea
media_inventory.caption: Conquering new heights fuels Tenzin—every destination is a challenge to explore.

media_inventory.title: Tahrush the Thrill-Seeker-at-Sea
media_inventory.caption: Fast-paced thrills keep Tahrush going—every cruise is a new adventure playground.

media_inventory.title: Tahani the Thrill-Seeker-at-Sea
media_inventory.caption: Speed, sun, and pure adrenaline—Tahani craves high-energy fun on the water.

media_inventory.title: London the Luxe Sefarer
media_inventory.caption: From designer boutiques to hidden gems, every port is an opportunity for London to indulge in something extraordinary.

media_inventory.title: Leo the Luxe Sefarer
media_inventory.caption: The Haven Lounge, a top-shelf drink, and flawless service — this is Leo’s kind of escape.

media_inventory.title: Lana the Luxe Sefarer
media_inventory.alt_text: Caricature of a woman smiling on a cruise.
media_inventory.caption: Lana loves an exquisite meal, impeccable ambiance, and not a single detail overlooked — perfection at sea.

media_inventory.title: Ethan the Easy Breezy Cruiser
media_inventory.caption: Ethan loves his vacations easy and carefree. No overplanning, no stress—just smooth sailing, cocktails in hand, and a perfectly picked cruise to match his vibe.

media_inventory.title: Emma the Easy Breezy Cruiser
media_inventory.caption: Emma is here for the fun! She thrives on live music, themed parties, and making new friends—all without sweating the details. Let’s plan the perfect cruise for her social side

media_inventory.title: Ellis the Easy Breezy Cruiser
media_inventory.caption: Ethan likes the perfect mix of adventure and relaxation. He wants the best shore excursions and the chillest sea days—without the hassle of planning
